titleStmt.title: A view of the English acquisitions in Guinea and the East Indies with an account of the religion, government, wars, strange customs, beasts, serpents, monsters, and other observables in those countries : together with a description of the Isle of St. Helena and the Bay of Sculdania where the English usually refresh in their voyages to the Indies : intermixt with pleasant relations and enlivened with picture / by R.B.
titleStmt.author: R. B., 1632?-1725?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
